definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc
in large part/the greater part/the majority

Four great compilations of Northern Song dynasty, namely: Extensive records of the Taiping era (978) 太平廣記|太平广记, Imperial readings of the Taiping era 太平御覽|太平御览, Prime tortoise of the record bureau 冊府元龜|册府元龟, Finest blossoms in the garden of literature 文苑英華|文苑英华
pinyin: Bei3 Song4 si4 da4 bu4 shu1

definition: super-ministry system (reform aimed at streamlining government department functions)

sentences.english: Agriculture consists largely of subsistence farming and animal husbandry.
sentences.chinese: 在農業中佔很大部分的是種植業和畜牧業。

sentences.english: In most cases, it is a good idea to include them.
sentences.chinese: 大部分情況下，把教育時間寫進去是個好主意。

sentences.english: The amount of time you spend alone has little to do with being lonely.
sentences.chinese: 你大部分獨自一人的時間想必和寂寞扯不上什麼關係。
你們大部分人採訪報道過我。

sentences.english: Lord, we are responsible for much of the suffering in this world.
sentences.chinese: 主啊，我們對世界上的苦難要付上大部分的責任。

sentences.english: Most of the scenes are written in verse, but some are in prose.
sentences.chinese: 她所寫的詩大部分都是無韻詩。

sentences.english: The bulk of our nutritional needs come from fruits, vegetables, and grains.
sentences.chinese: 我們所需的營養大部分都來自於水果，蔬菜和穀物。

sentences.english: Europe and Russia accounted for bulk of tobacco exports in the current year.
sentences.chinese: 歐洲和俄羅斯佔本年度菸草出口的大部分。

sentences.english: Perhaps, but many entrepreneurs go through a grind-it-out phase.
sentences.chinese: 可能吧，但大部分創業者都會經歷一個艱難期。

sentences.english: Most cases seldom present examples of absolutely perfect or totally flawed systems.
sentences.chinese: 大部份的個案鮮有絕對完美或一無可取的情況。

sentences.english: Ischemic colitis commonly occurs in the elderly and has a wide clinical spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的虛血性大腸炎發生在老年人。

sentences.english: All their costs, including study and living expenses, will be covered by the fund.
sentences.chinese: 包括通信費在內的大部分支出，都會由公司支付。

sentences.english: Among hardiest of cherimoya, does well in most present growing areas.
sentences.chinese: 耐寒其中荔枝，做得好，目前大部分主產區。

sentences.english: Most analysts assumed that Inouye would liquidate the company.
sentences.chinese: 大部分分析人士認爲Inouye將清算公司。

sentences.english: Which continent produces the most cocoa?
sentences.chinese: 哪一個大陸生產了大部份的可可亞？

sentences.english: Curse of the Golden Flower takes place mostly within the confines of the palace itself.
sentences.chinese: 《滿城盡帶黃金甲》大部分故事發生在宮廷裏面。
